text:
Hi, 

Appreciate some help here.. 

Error log isn't writing shutdown logs with rotatelog, but default Error log is writing the shutdown log. 

Below I'm providing used ErrorLog directive, OS and Apache Versions. 
ErrorLog "|$/local/apache/2.4.17/bin/rotatelogs /local/apache/logs/test.com/error_logs.2.4.%Y.%m.%d 86400" 

Apache Version: 2.4.17 
OS version: SunOS 5.10 sun4v sparc sun4v 

Can anyone shed some light here. I've tried with Apache 2.4.16 version and tried this solution "https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=55072" 


Thanks in Advance
